title: Infernal Dragon in Moutain Rift
body:
Last game there was Infernal Dragon despite it being Moutain Rift.
The order was Infernal, Ocean, Moutain, Infernal.

This is example of how four slain dragons should be displayed normally.
http://i.imgur.com/6V97uUs.png

This is the bugged game. It completely ignored the Moutain Dragon that defined the rift. It even states four were slain but skips the third.
http://i.imgur.com/HXmD4DO.png

Don't get me wrong, it's a nice smiley picture but that Infernal had no business burning in the lands of rock.

replies.body: Hey, thanks for reporting this! Was there a Shaco or another champion with a clone in the game that this happened in?

If the games match up with the objectives/bans, Shaco was in this one.

https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/match/eune/2317070132#participant4

This one did not contain a clone champion. 

https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/match/eune/2316450030#participant10
Just confirming what AIQ said: Indeed, there was Shaco, he linked correct game.
